titleStmt.title: Hewson reduc'd, or, The shoomaker return'd to his trade being a show, wherein is represented the honesty, inoffensiveness, and ingenuity of that profession, when 'tis kept within its own bounds, and goes not beyond the last / written by a true friend to the gentle craft.
titleStmt.author: True friend to the gentle craft.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
